author: Jessica

text: Hello Friday! Here’s what the weekend looks like! EATING My strawberry avocado salsa. And this cucumber melon salad! Also the best ever baked beans!! They can’t be beat. And my whole entire 4th of july recipe guide. DRINKING A spicy grapefruit tequila soda. So refreshing. BAKING My triple berry trifle with raspberry sauce. Oh and this triple berry coffee cake! MAKING My dill pickle chicken salad. Its such a great make-ahead lunch. SNACKING On chimichurri and pistachio grilled feta. Pass the crackers! GRILLING My grilled lemon shrimp with pesto couscous. SO delish. CRAVING A pimento cheese BLT. It’s at the top of the list! LISTENING To Ina, Nancy and Diane hosting a dinner party. Just do it! READING Sounds Like Love. And loving it! Here’s my summer reading list. WEARING This pleated maxi dress. I also love this straw circle tote and the starfish clutch! SHOPPING This awesome little jewelry tray holder that folds up – great for vacation! This k18 volume spray is also in my cart. And yes, of course I bought the stupid umbrella for my phone. How did you know?! LOVING This rhone casual sleeveless dress. Has been a lifesaver in the crazy heat this week. I also really love the rhone half zip! SHARING All of my kids’ favorite neon swim gear. It’s a lifesaver in the pool and at the beach! Also, all my 4th of July goodies. Amazon 4th of July too! CELEBRATING Two months of Easy Everyday being out in the world!! If you haven’t grabbed your copy, you can get it here. And join our bookclub where we cook through the book!
html:
Hello Friday! Here’s what the weekend looks like!

EATING

My strawberry avocado salsa. And this cucumber melon salad! Also the best ever baked beans!! They can’t be beat. And my whole entire 4th of july recipe guide.

DRINKING

A spicy grapefruit tequila soda. So refreshing.

BAKING

My triple berry trifle with raspberry sauce. Oh and this triple berry coffee cake!

MAKING

My dill pickle chicken salad. Its such a great make-ahead lunch.

SNACKING

On chimichurri and pistachio grilled feta. Pass the crackers!

GRILLING

My grilled lemon shrimp with pesto couscous. SO delish.

CRAVING

A pimento cheese BLT. It’s at the top of the list!

LISTENING

To Ina, Nancy and Diane hosting a dinner party. Just do it!

READING

Sounds Like Love. And loving it! Here’s my summer reading list.

WEARING

This pleated maxi dress. I also love this straw circle tote and the starfish clutch!

SHOPPING

This awesome little jewelry tray holder that folds up – great for vacation! This k18 volume spray is also in my cart. And yes, of course I bought the stupid umbrella for my phone. How did you know?!

LOVING

This rhone casual sleeveless dress. Has been a lifesaver in the crazy heat this week. I also really love the rhone half zip!

SHARING

All of my kids’ favorite neon swim gear. It’s a lifesaver in the pool and at the beach! Also, all my 4th of July goodies. Amazon 4th of July too!

CELEBRATING

Two months of Easy Everyday being out in the world!! If you haven’t grabbed your copy, you can get it here. And join our bookclub where we cook through the book!
